017package org.microbean.qualifier;
018
019import java.lang.constant.Constable;
020
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.HashSet;
023import java.util.Iterator;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.Map.Entry;
026import java.util.Objects;
027import java.util.SortedMap;
028import java.util.Spliterator;
029import java.util.TreeMap;
030
031import java.util.function.Predicate;
032
033import java.util.stream.Stream;
034
035import static java.util.Collections.emptySortedMap;
036import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSortedMap;
037
038/**
039 * An {@code abstract}, {@link Constable}, immutable, sorted set of
040 * key-value pairs that can be used to further refine an object for
041 * many different purposes.
042 *
043 * <p>Keys are sorted according to their natural order.</p>
044 *
045 * <p>This is a <a
046 * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/doc-files/ValueBased.html">value-based
047 * class</a>.</p>
048 *
049 * <p>Values of type {@code K} must be members of classes adhering to
050 * <a
051 * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/doc-files/ValueBased.html">value-based
052 * semantics</a>.</p>
053 *
054 * <p>Values of type {@code V} must be members of classes adhering to
055 * <a
056 * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/doc-files/ValueBased.html">value-based
057 * semantics</a>.</p>
058 *
059 * <p>Undefined behavior will result if the preceding requirements are
060 * not honored.</p>
061 *
062 * @param <K> the type borne by the keys of the entries in this
063 * {@link Bindings}
064 *
065 * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the entries in this
066 * {@link Bindings}
067 *
068 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
069 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
070 */
071public abstract class Bindings<K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> implements Constable, Iterable<Entry<K, V>> {
072
073
074  /*
075   * Instance fields.
076   */
077
078
079  private final SortedMap<K, V> bindings;
080
081  private final SortedMap<K, V> info;
082
083
084  /*
085   * Constructors.
086   */
087
088
089  /**
090   * Creates a new {@link Bindings}.
091   *
092   * @param bindings a {@link Map} representing the bindings to be
093   * modeled by this {@link Bindings}; may be {@code null} in which
094   * case an {@linkplain Map#isEmpty() empty <code>Map</code>} will be
095   * used instead
096   *
097   * @param info informational key-value pairs; may be {@code
098   * null} in which case an {@linkplain Map#isEmpty() empty
099   * <code>Map</code>} will be used instead
100   *
101   * @param copy if {@code false}, the supplied {@link Map}s will not
102   * be copied and will be stored by reference; it is recommended to
103   * supply {@code true} for this parameter in all but the most
104   * specific circumstances
105   */
106  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
107  protected Bindings(final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> bindings,
108                     final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> info,
109                     final boolean copy) {
110    super();
111    if (bindings == null || bindings.isEmpty()) {
112      this.bindings = emptySortedMap();
113    } else if (copy || !(bindings instanceof SortedMap)) {
114      this.bindings = unmodifiableSortedMap(new TreeMap<>(bindings));
115    } else {
116      this.bindings = unmodifiableSortedMap((SortedMap<K, V>)bindings);
117    }
118    if (info == null || info.isEmpty()) {
119      this.info = emptySortedMap();
120    } else {
121      final TreeMap<K, V> map = new TreeMap<>();
122      for (final K key : info.keySet()) {
123        if (!this.bindings.containsKey(key)) {
124          map.put(key, info.get(key));
125        }
126      }
127      this.info = unmodifiableSortedMap(map);
128    }
129  }
130
131  /**
132   * Returns an immutable {@link Map} representation of this {@link
133   * Bindings}.
134   *
135   * @return an immutable {@link Map} representation of this {@link
136   * Bindings}
137   *
138   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
139   *
140   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
141   *
142   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
143   * threads.
144   */
145  public final Map<K, V> toMap() {
146    return this.bindings;
147  }
148
149  /**
150   * Returns an immutable {@link Map} representation of the
151   * informational {@link Map} {@linkplain #Bindings(Map, Map,
152   * boolean) supplied at construction time}.
153   *
154   * @return an immutable {@link Map} representation of the
155   * informational {@link Map} {@linkplain #Bindings(Map, Map,
156   * boolean) supplied at construction time}
157   *
158   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
159   *
160   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
161   *
162   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
163   * threads.
164   */
165  public final Map<K, V> info() {
166    return this.info;
167  }
168
169  /**
170   * Returns {@code true} if this {@link Bindings} is logically empty.
171   *
172   * @return {@code true} if this {@link Bindings} is logically empty
173   *
174   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
175   *
176   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
177   * threads.
178   *
179   * @see #size()
180   */
181  public final boolean isEmpty() {
182    return this.toMap().isEmpty();
183  }
184
185  /**
186   * Returns {@code 0} or a positive integer describing the number of
187   * entries contained by this {@link Bindings}.
188   *
189   * @return the size of this {@link Bindings}
190   *
191   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
192   *
193   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
194   * threads.
195   */
196  public final int size() {
197    return this.toMap().size();
198  }
199
200  /**
201   * Returns a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link Iterator} of {@link
202   * Entry} instances contained by this {@link Bindings}.
203   *
204   * @return a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link Iterator} of {@link
205   * Entry} instances contained by this {@link Bindings}
206   *
207   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
208   *
209   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
210   *
211   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
212   * threads.
213   */
214  @Override // Iterable<K, V>
215  public final Iterator<Entry<K, V>> iterator() {
216    return this.toMap().entrySet().iterator();
217  }
218
219
220  /**
221   * Returns a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link Spliterator} of
222   * {@link Entry} instances contained by this {@link Bindings}.
223   *
224   * @return a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link Spliterator} of
225   * {@link Entry} instances contained by this {@link Bindings}
226   *
227   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
228   *
229   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
230   *
231   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
232   * threads.
233   */
234  @Override // Iterable<K, V>
235  public final Spliterator<Entry<K, V>> spliterator() {
236    return this.toMap().entrySet().spliterator();
237  }
238
239  /**
240   * Returns a possibly parallel {@link Stream} of this {@link
241   * Bindings}' {@linkplain Entry entries}.
242   *
243   * @return a possibly parallel {@link Stream} of this {@link
244   * Bindings}' {@linkplain Entry entries}
245   *
246   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
247   *
248   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
249   *
250   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
251   * threads.
252   */
253  public final Stream<Entry<K, V>> parallelStream() {
254    return this.toMap().entrySet().parallelStream();
255  }
256
257  /**
258   * Returns a possibly parallel {@link Stream} of this {@link
259   * Bindings}' {@linkplain Entry entries}.
260   *
261   * @return a possibly parallel {@link Stream} of this {@link
262   * Bindings}' {@linkplain Entry entries}
263   *
264   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
265   *
266   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
267   *
268   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
269   * threads.
270   */
271  public final Stream<Entry<K, V>> stream() {
272    return this.toMap().entrySet().stream();
273  }
274
275  /**
276   * Returns {@code true} if this {@link Bindings} logically contains
277   * the supplied {@link Bindings}.
278   *
279   * <p>A {@link Bindings} is said to contain another {@link
280   * Bindings} if either:</p>
281   *
282   * <ul>
283   *
284   * <li>the two {@link Bindings} instances are identical, or</li>
285   *
286   * <li>the {@linkplain Map#size() size} of the first {@link
287   * Bindings} is greater than the {@linkplain Map#size() size} of the
288   * second {@link Bindings}, and the {@linkplain Map#entrySet() entry
289   * set} of this {@link Bindings} {@linkplain
290   * java.util.Set#containsAll(java.util.Collection) contains all} of
291   * the entries in the second {@link Bindings}' {@linkplain
292   * Map#entrySet() entry set}</li>
293   *
294   * </ul>
295   *
296   * @param other the {@link Bindings} to test; must not be {@code
297   * null}
298   *
299   * @return {@code true} if this {@link Bindings} logically
300   * contains the supplied {@link Bindings}
301   *
302   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code other} is {@code null}
303   *
304   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
305   *
306   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
307   * threads.
308   *
309   * @see Map#size()
310   *
311   * @see java.util.Set#containsAll(java.util.Collection)
312   */
313  public final boolean contains(final Bindings<?, ?> other) {
314    return this == other || this.size() >= other.size() && this.toMap().entrySet().containsAll(other.toMap().entrySet()); 
315  }
316
317  /**
318   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Bindings}
319   * logically contains an entry equal to the supplied {@link Entry}.
320   *
321   * @param e the {@link Entry} to test; may be {@code null} in which
322   * case {@code false} will be returned
323   *
324   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Bindings}
325   * logically contains an entry equal to the supplied {@link Entry}
326   *
327   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
328   *
329   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
330   * threads.
331   */
332  public final boolean contains(final Entry<?, ?> e) {
333    final Object v = e == null ? null : this.toMap().get(e.getKey());
334    return v != null && v.equals(e.getValue());
335  }
336
337  /**
338   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Bindings}
339   * logically contains a key equal to the supplied {@code key}.
340   *
341   * @param key the key in question; may be {@code null} in which case
342   * {@code false} will be returned
343   *
344   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Bindings}
345   * logically contains a key equal to the supplied {@code key}
346   *
347   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
348   *
349   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
350   * threads.
351   */
352  public final boolean containsKey(final Object key) {
353    return key != null && this.toMap().containsKey(key);
354  }
355
356  /**
357   * Returns the value indexed under the supplied {@code key}, or
358   * {@code null} if there is no such value.
359   *
360   * @param key the key in question; may be {@code null} in which case
361   * {@code false} will be returned
362   *
363   * @return the value indexed under the supplied {@code key}, or
364   * {@code null} if there is no such value
365   *
366   * @nullability This method may return {@code null}.
367   *
368   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
369   *
370   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
371   * threads.
372   */
373  public final V get(final Object key) {
374    return key == null ? null : this.toMap().get(key);
375  }
376
377  /**
378   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Bindings} is a
379   * subset of the supplied {@link Bindings}.
380   *
381   * @param other the other {@link Bindings}; must not be {@code
382   * null}
383   *
384   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Bindings} is a
385   * subset of the supplied {@link Bindings}
386   *
387   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code other} is {@code null}
388   *
389   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
390   *
391   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
392   * threads.
393   */
394  public final boolean isSubsetOf(final Bindings<?, ?> other) {
395    return other == this || other.contains(this);
396  }
397
398  /**
399   * Returns the number of entries this {@link Bindings} has in
400   * common with the supplied {@link Bindings}.
401   *
402   * <p>The number returned will be {@code 0} or greater.</p>
403   *
404   * @param other the other {@link Bindings}; may be {@code null} in
405   * which case {@code 0} will be returned
406   *
407   * @return the number of entries this {@link Bindings} has in
408   * common with the supplied {@link Bindings}
409   *
410   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
411   *
412   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
413   * threads.
414   */
415  public final int intersectionSize(final Bindings<?, ?> other) {
416    if (other == this) {
417      // Just an identity check to rule this easy case out.
418      return this.size();
419    } else if (other == null || other.isEmpty()) {
420      return 0;
421    } else {
422      final Collection<? extends Entry<?, ?>> otherEntrySet = other.toMap().entrySet();
423      return (int)this.toMap().entrySet()
424        .stream()
425        .filter(otherEntrySet::contains)
426        .count();
427    }
428  }
429
430  /**
431   * Returns the size of the <em>symmetric difference</em> between
432   * this {@link Bindings} and the supplied {@link Bindings}.
433   *
434   * <p>The number returned is always {@code 0} or greater.</p>
435   *
436   * <p>The size of the symmetric difference between two {@link
437   * Bindings} instances is the number of qualifier entries that are
438   * in one {@link Bindings} instance but not in the other.</p>
439   *
440   * @param other the other {@link Bindings} instance; may be {@code
441   * null}
442   *
443   * @return the size of the <em>symmetric difference</em> between
444   * this {@link Bindings} and the supplied {@link Bindings};
445   * always {@code 0} or greater
446   *
447   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
448   *
449   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
450   * threads.
451   */
452  public final int symmetricDifferenceSize(final Bindings<?, ?> other) {
453    if (other == this) {
454      // Just an identity check to rule this easy case out.
455      return 0;
456    } else if (other == null || other.isEmpty()) {
457      return this.size();
458    } else if (this.equals(other)) {
459      return 0;
460    } else {
461      final Collection<Entry<?, ?>> otherSymmetricDifference = new HashSet<>(this.toMap().entrySet());
462      other.toMap()
463        .entrySet()
464        .stream()
465        .filter(Predicate.not(otherSymmetricDifference::add))
466        .forEach(otherSymmetricDifference::remove);
467      return otherSymmetricDifference.size();
468    }
469  }
470
471  /**
472   * Returns a hashcode for this {@link Bindings}.
473   *
474   * <p>Only binding entries are considered.</p>
475   *
476   * @return a hashcode for this {@link Bindings}
477   *
478   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
479   *
480   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
481   * threads.
482   *
483   * @see Object#hashCode()
484   */
485  @Override // Object
486  public int hashCode() {
487    return this.toMap().hashCode();
488  }
489
490  /**
491   * Returns {@code true} if this {@link Bindings} is equal to the
492   * supplied {@link Object}.
493   *
494   * <p>Only binding entries are considered.</p>
495   *
496   * @param other the object to test; may be {@code null} in which
497   * case {@code false} will be returned
498   *
499   * @return {@code true} if this {@link Bindings} is equal to the
500   * supplied {@link Object}; {@code false} otherwise
501   *
502   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
503   *
504   * @threadsafety This method is safe  for concurrent use by multiple
505   * threads.
506   */
507  @Override // Object
508  public boolean equals(final Object other) {
509    if (other == this) {
510      return true;
511    } else if (other != null && other.getClass() == this.getClass()) {
512      return
513        Objects.equals(this.toMap(), ((Bindings<?, ?>)other).toMap());
514    } else {
515      return false;
516    }
517  }
518
519  /**
520   * Returns a non-{@code null} {@link String} representation of this
521   * {@link Bindings}.
522   *
523   * <p>The format of the returned {@link String} is deliberately
524   * undefined and subject to change without notice between versions
525   * of this class.</p>
526   *
527   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link String} representation of this
528   * {@link Bindings}
529   *
530   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
531   *
532   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
533   *
534   * @threadsafety This method is safe  for concurrent use by multiple
535   * threads.
536   *
537   * @see #toString(boolean)
538   */
539  @Override // Object
540  public String toString() {
541    return this.toString(true);
542  }
543
544  /**
545   * Returns a non-{@code null} {@link String} representation of this
546   * {@link Bindings}.
547   *
548   * <p>The format of the returned {@link String} is deliberately
549   * undefined and subject to change without notice between versions
550   * of this class.</p>
551   *
552   * @param withInfo if {@code true}, then a {@link String}
553   * representatino of the {@linkplain #info() informational bindings}
554   * will be included in the returned {@link String}
555   *
556   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link String} representation of this
557   * {@link Bindings}
558   *
559   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
560   *
561   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
562   *
563   * @threadsafety This method is safe  for concurrent use by multiple
564   * threads.
565   *
566   * @see #toString(boolean)
567   */
568  public String toString(final boolean withInfo) {
569    if (withInfo) {
570      return Map.of("bindings", this.toMap().toString(), "info", this.info().toString()).toString();
571    } else {
572      return Map.of("bindings", this.toMap().toString()).toString();
573    }
574  }
575
576}
